metadata.title: Best Anchor (Spotify for Podcasters) Alternatives 2025
metadata.description: Looking for an Anchor alternative? Compare podcast hosting platforms for YouTube creators and podcasters.

hero.headline: Best Anchor Alternatives for Podcasters
hero.subheadline: Podcast hosting options beyond Spotify for Podcasters (formerly Anchor).

sections.content: Anchor (now Spotify for Podcasters) is free but comes with limitations. Some creators want more analytics, better monetization, or independence from Spotify. Here are the best alternatives for hosting your podcast.

content.title: Buzzsprout
content.description: Great analytics, easy to use. Popular among independent creators.

content.title: Transistor
content.description: Unlimited podcasts on one account. Great for agencies and multi-show creators.

content.title: Captivate
content.description: Powerful marketing tools. Built for growth-focused podcasters.

faq.question: Is Anchor really free?
faq.answer: Yes, but with limitations. Spotify owns your monetization. Analytics are basic. Fine for starting, but serious podcasters often upgrade.

faq.question: Can I move from Anchor easily?
faq.answer: Yes. Export your RSS feed and import to new host. Redirect your feed. Most platforms have migration guides.

faq.question: Which has best analytics?
faq.answer: Buzzsprout and Captivate have excellent analytics. Transistor is good too. All far exceed Anchor's basic stats.

faq.question: Best for video podcasts on YouTube?
faq.answer: Podbean has video podcast features. But for YouTube specifically, just upload directly to YouTube. Use audio host for podcast apps.
